title: Warren Buffett: Investor. Teacher. Icon.
text:
More Warren Buffett: Investor. Teacher. Icon. About This CNBC original documentary takes viewers inside the story of Warren Buffett’s extraordinary success and profiles some of the many people whose lives have been influenced, and even changed, by Buffett’s investment advice and life lessons. About
This CNBC original documentary takes viewers inside the story of Warren Buffett’s extraordinary success and profiles some of the many people whose lives have been influenced, and even changed, by Buffett’s investment advice and life lessons.
